title: owncloud hangs on sync
body:
### expected behaviour upload changed existing file to server. ### actual behaviour client print error message: "unknown error". the cpu load of apache is rising to 97%. after close the client, apache is still running the next one hour, see owncloud.log i use owncloud since server version 5.0.9. this issue occurs first time with version 5.0.12. ### steps to reproduce 1. a text file existis on server and local owncloud path. 2. change text file. 3. save text file. 3. owncloud client try to upload the changed file and return error message "unknown error". close the client, restart apache, and start client again. same behaviour. client try sync the files, apache hangs. ### server configuration operating system: linux raspberrypi 3.6.11+ #538 preempt fri aug 30 20:42:08 bst 2013 armv6l web server: apache2, verison 2.2.22-13 database: sqlite, version 2.8.17-7 php version: 5.4.4-14+deb7u owncloud version: 5.0.12 storage backend: sd card ### client configuration client version: 1.4.1 operating system: opensuse 12.3 os language: german installation path of client: /usr/bin/x11/ ### logs 1. output of `owncloud --logwindow` or `owncloud --logfile log.txt` 10-12 17:23:58:372 oc_module: neon error code was 6 10-12 17:23:58:372 oc_module: wrn: propfind named failed with 6, request error: could not read status line: connection timed out 10-12 17:23:58:372 oc_module: errno set to 10007 10-12 17:23:58:372 csync_ftw: opendir failed for ownclouds://wrosiak.de/remote.php/webdav - unbekannter fehler 10007 (errno 10007) 10-12 17:23:58:372 #### error during csync_update : "es ist zu einer zeitã¼berschreitung der netzwerkverbindung gekommen.
systemnachricht:unknown error." 10-12 17:23:58:373 csync run took 30533 milliseconds 10-12 17:23:58:374 -> csync finished slot with error true 10-12 17:23:58:374 starting event logging again in 2000 milliseconds 10-12 17:23:58:375 oo folder slotsyncfinished: result: 2 10-12 17:23:58:375 ** error strings: ("es ist zu einer zeitã¼berschreitung der netzwerkverbindung gekommen.
systemnachricht:unknown error.", "datei owncloud_bug_report.txt: unknown error.") 10-12 17:23:58:375 * owncloud csync thread finished with error 10-12 17:23:58:375 folder in overallstatus message: mirall::folder(0x2733af0) with name "owncloud" 10-12 17:23:58:376 sync state changed for folder "owncloud" : "error" 10-12 17:23:58:376 setting up host header: "wrosiak.de" 10-12 17:23:58:376 <===================================== sync finished for "owncloud" 10-12 17:23:58:576 xx slotschedulefoldersync: folderqueue size: 0 10-12 17:24:00:374 * event notification enabled 2. web server error log: access.log 193.239.187.140 - - [12/oct/2013:17:12:41 +0200] "get /user/soapcaller.bs http/1.1" 302 371 "-" "morfeus fucking scanner" error.log [sat oct 12 17:17:28 2013] [warn] rsa server certificate is a ca certificate (basicconstraints: ca == true !?) [sat oct 12 17:17:28 2013] [warn] rsa server certificate commonname (cn) `wrosiak.de' does not match server name!? [sat oct 12 17:17:31 2013] [warn] rsa server certificate is a ca certificate (basicconstraints: ca == true !?) [sat oct 12 17:17:31 2013] [warn] rsa server certificate commonname (cn) `wrosiak.de' does not match server name!?
